body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Nearby Attractions              Nearby Attractions       Whatever you are looking for in a national park, chances are Golden Gate has it. There are so many trails, historic structures, natural areas, and public programs in the Golden Gate National Park that the hardest thing to do is decide which one to try. Check out some of the nearby attractions brought to you by our park partners.      MUSEUMS & ATTRACTIONS         Bay Area Discovery Museum 557 McReynolds Road (at Fort Baker) Sausalito, CA 94965 (415) 339-3900 Hours: Tuesday–Friday, 9 AM–4 PM; Saturday & Sunday, 10 AM–5 PM; closed Mondays (except when noted)         The Exploratorium Pier 15 San Francisco, CA 94111 (415) 528-4444 Hours: Tuesday–Sunday, 10 AM–5 PM (Closed Mondays, Thanksgiving Day and Christmas Day)         the Marine Mammal Center 2000 Bunker Road Marin Headlands Sausalito, CA 94965 (415) 289-7325 Hours: See website for times and directions.         The Walt Disney Family Museum 104 Montgomery Street Presidio of San Francisco (at the Main Post) San Francisco, CA 94129 (415) 345-6800 Hours: Wednesday–Monday, 10 AM–6 PM (Closed every Tuesday, January 1, July 4, Thanksgiving Day, and Christmas Day)      ACCOMMODATIONS         Cavallo Point—the Lodge at the Golden Gate 601 Murray Circle Fort Baker Sausalito, CA 94965 888-651-2003         Hostelling International San Francisco Fisherman's Wharf Hostel Fort Mason, Building 240 San Francisco, CA 94123  (415) 771-7277 Marin Headlands Hostel Fort Barry Building 941 Sausalito, CA 94965  (415) 331-2777      RECREATIONAL         Miwok Livery Stables 701 Tennessee Valley Rd Marin Headlands Mill Valley, CA 94941  (415) 383-8048
title: Golden Gate National Recreation Area: Nearby Attractions
